title: GET_CONVAR_FLOAT
content:
0x9E666D// GetConvarFloat
float GET_CONVAR_FLOAT(char* varName, float defaultValue);Parameters:varName: The console variable to getdefaultValue: The default value to set, if none are found.Returns: Returns the value set in varName, or default if none are specifiedThis will have floating point inaccuracy.
codeBlocks:
// GetConvarFloat
float GET_CONVAR_FLOAT(char* varName, float defaultValue);
